name: TRIBECCA_HOME_Eland_Brown_Glider_Recliner_Loveseat
reviews: Fun and very comfortable. We use it every day. Conforms very well to lower back problems

Do not buy this! I purchased mine 3 years ago with a warranty for the leather. It started coming off. I called the warranty company and sent pictures. I was told it was normal wear and tear. It is only 3 years old. I then went to pedigo furniture where I purchased this loveseat and a couch. The owner/manager told me the company has went out of business and there has been problems with the fabric/leather. He said he could do nothing for me. Now the leather is peeling off so bad, I can not use it anymore. 3 year old furniture I paid $3,000 for is totally destroyed. Please don't buy this!!!!!!!

The love seat is very lovely. The dark brown color looks very elegant. The love seat recliner and swivel back and fort seating very enjoyable. I receive the item without any damages. The love seat also has cup holder and a little compartment for TV and stereo remote controls. I love it.
very comfortable, fits me just right, my wife and kids love it too
The frame was bent and it's falling apart
It is a bit light (moves easily on hardwood) bit very nice looking and comfortable
Not worth the money, look for something else
description: Sit down, kick back and get ready to enjoy the big game in this Eland Brown glider recliner loveseat from Tribecca Home. The brown bonded leather upholstery has a soft, luxurious feel and a rich, handsome look that goes great in a living room, family room or den.Loveseat sold individuallyPine and plywood construction for strength and durabilityBrown bonded leather upholstery has rich look and luxurious feelPolyurethane foam fill and inner spring cushion for a comfortable seatGlider recliner function allows relaxing with your feet upSinuous springs offer smooth operationSeat height is 18"Overall dimensions are 39.37"H x 77.17"W x 38.58"DStyleContemporaryMaterialPineTypeLoveseatAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
